body: Like, all I'm seeing are people leaving. Why?

title: Why are so many people leaving?

replies.body: Everyone has their own reasons. Some people left because of bad decisions some people left because they can't play this game as much as they did.
replies.body_tagged: Everyone has their own reasons. Some people left because of bad decisions some people left because they can't play this game as much as they did.

replies.body:
Mods.

not saying all mods are doing a bad job but I know they are a big factor for people leaving

replies.body: Game does are really dull and chat is spammed up with hackusations and other things. Plus Avicus moderators don't really do much apart from talk in ts. Not a majority do this but some do (NOT THE PEOPLE I TALK TO ON TS <3) I have seen moderators in games where spam and griefing is happening and they are doing nothing.
